com.facebook.react.views.picker

类 ReactPickerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseJavaModule
      • com.facebook.react.uimanager.ViewManager<T,C>
        • com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager<T,LayoutShadowNode>
          • com.facebook.react.uimanager.SimpleViewManager<ReactPicker>
            • com.facebook.react.views.picker.ReactPickerManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    NativeModule, BaseViewManagerInterface<ReactPicker>
    直接已知子类:
    ReactDialogPickerManager, ReactDropdownPickerManager

    public abstract class ReactPickerManager
extends SimpleViewManager<ReactPicker>
    ViewManager for the ReactPicker view. This is abstract because the Spinner doesn't support setting the mode (dropdown/dialog) outside the constructor, so that is delegated to the separate ReactDropdownPickerManager and ReactDialogPickerManager components. These are merged back on the JS side into one React component.

      • onAfterUpdateTransaction

        protected void onAfterUpdateTransaction(ReactPicker view)
        从类复制的说明: ViewManager
        Callback that will be triggered after all properties are updated in current update transaction (all @ReactProp handlers for properties updated in current transaction have been called). If you want to override this method you should call super.onAfterUpdateTransaction from it as the parent class of the ViewManager may rely on callback being executed.
        覆盖:
        onAfterUpdateTransaction 在类中 BaseViewManager<ReactPicker,LayoutShadowNode>

      • addEventEmitters

        protected void addEventEmitters(ThemedReactContext reactContext,
                                ReactPicker picker)
        从类复制的说明: ViewManager
        Subclasses can override this method to install custom event emitters on the given View. You might want to override this method if your view needs to emit events besides basic touch events to JS (e.g. scroll events).
        覆盖:
        addEventEmitters 在类中 ViewManager<ReactPicker,LayoutShadowNode>

      • receiveCommand

        public void receiveCommand(ReactPicker view,
                           java.lang.String commandId,
                           ReadableArray args)
        从类复制的说明: ViewManager
        Subclasses may use this method to receive events/commands directly from JS through the UIManager. Good example of such a command would be scrollTo request with coordinates for a ReactScrollView instance.
        覆盖:
        receiveCommand 在类中 ViewManager<ReactPicker,LayoutShadowNode>
        参数:
        view - View instance that should receive the command
        commandId - code of the command
        args - optional arguments for the command
